title: Amazon pledges $35 billion for India by 2030, with a quick commerce push
description: Amazon will step up investments in India to $35 billion by 2030 — an increase of about $20 billion from a previously stated commitment — as it ramps up 10-minute delivery and doubles down on other businesses, said Amit Agarwal, its senior vice-president for emerging markets. The latest investment pledge follows an announcement two years ago that it would plough in $15 billion by 2030. A large part of that--around $12.7 billion--was toward artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud infrastructure through Amazon Web Services (AWS).
content:

title: The scientific case for the existence of intelligent alien life
description: The foundation of science is based on the humility to learn, not the arrogance of expertise. title: Google names Amin Vahdat as new chief of AI infrastructure buildout, Semafor reports
description: Dec 10 (Reuters) - Alphabet's Google has appointed longtime executive Amin Vahdat as chief technologist for AI infrastructure, Semafor reported on Wednesday, citing an internal memo, as tech giants pour billions into the computing backbone needed to power artificial intelligence.

title: Google DeepMind Will Open AI Lab in UK to Discover New Materials
description: Google DeepMind will open its first research lab for discovering new materials, like those used in batteries or semiconductors, as part of its push to apply artificial intelligence to more scientific fields.
content:

title: OpenAI warns new models pose 'high' cybersecurity risk
description: Dec 10 (Reuters) - OpenAI on Wednesday warned that its upcoming artificial intelligence models could pose a "high" cybersecurity risk, as their capabilities advance rapidly.

title: Adobe sees upbeat annual results on AI, design software strength
description: Dec 10 (Reuters) - Adobe forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, signaling strong demand for the Photoshop maker's design tools and increasing monetization for its artificial intelligence offerings.

description: OpenAI's ChatGPT generative artificial intelligence app led Apple's 2025 list of the most-downloaded free apps that iPhone owners installed this year.
